description:
A narrow chain with heavily chamfered outer plates for improved shifting and quieter running. Chrome hardened pins resist wear and ensure extended life.

  • Compatible with SRAM 11-speed groupsets
  • Solid pin construction is strong and durable
  • PowerLock connecting link
  • Nickel silver outer plates, grey inner plates
name: SRAM PC 1130 11-Speed Chain 120 Links
